name: Lil Trash Friend
description:
Nothing goes right in Mr. Raccoon's love life. In a desperate attempt to reclaim his beloved, he'll do anything, even stealing from the human burrow. 

 

Lil Trash Friend is a stealth game in which you play the unexpected thief Mr.Raccoon whose objective is to steal, without being detected, a list of items that Ms.Raccoon desperately wants. 

  • SNEAKY: Move strategically in a real-time grid system without getting spotted ! 
  • STRONK: Mr.Raccoon is not the strongest raccoons and cannot hold an object for more than 10 seconds without dropping it. Ms.Raccoon will never accept an object too dirty.
    Predict your path, use pillows as storage space to stall and plan your next move and get your findings to the burrow without them slipping out of your paws!
  • THONK: Change the laser layout like a master thief, use your best sidesteps to dodge cameras or pets to survive this fortress! 
  • VIBIN': Enjoy this offbeat stealth game with a jazzy soundtrack specially composed for this jam. 



Gameplay Goal: 

Find and bring back items from Mrs.Raccoon’ list without getting spotted or without dropping it.  An item too dirty won’t spawn back, so be careful!

Pillow sytem: 

Pillows are storage spaces! Drop items into one of these pillows and their timers will pause. Perfect to plan your next move!

Scoring system: 

Bring at least 3 items for the first star to unlock the next level. Continue the challenge, bring all items and aim for the best score with 3 stars !. 

Obstacles: 

Many obstacles will stand in your way. Be very attentive to them as the first mistake is the end of the run.

QWSD / ZQSD to move around

hold SPACE to hold loot

Press E to interact with items (collectable/doors/levers) 

Press ESC to pause
